title: January 2026 Releases
description: conda 26.1.0, conda-build 26.1.0, and conda-pack 0.9.1 have been released! 🎉

title: Conda CLI Roadmap Updates: Q1, 2026
description: The Q1 2026 Conda CLI roadmap highlights faster performance, safer ways to work with PyPI packages, and progress toward reproducible environments.

title: You Can Install PostgreSQL with conda?
description: Did you know it's possible to install and run PostgreSQL with conda? Find out how in this first post in the "You Can Do That with conda?" series.

title: conda-meta-mcp: Expert Conda Ecosystem Data for AI Agents
description: Introducing conda-meta-mcp: an MCP server providing AI agents with real-time, authoritative conda ecosystem metadata to overcome model knowledge cutoffs and enable intelligent packaging decisions.

title: New community meetings schedule for 2026
description: Starting in 2026, conda and conda-forge will share the same time slots for their community calls.
